scripts.start-dev: npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all && nodemon server/index.js
scripts.reset:db: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all
scripts.setup:db: npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
